reviews.review: 期望太高，并没有想象中那么好玩
Wciągająca rozgrywka z fabułą przez którą człowiek nie chce odejść od komputera, polecam!
Het beste spel in de Bioshock lijn dusver. Kleurijke gfx en goede AI maken dit een leuk spel. Het verhaal is een en al schizofrene saai-faai poep.
Truly a masterpiece. The story and it's twists and abyss gave me goosebumps constantly.

The best ending to a game i have seen
Absolutely amazing 10/10
This game is a real gem

I really wanted to like Infinite. I had been excited for it for so long.

I mean, its an aesthetic I enjoy. That "Before the Great War" aesthetic of boundless optimism. Its religious stuff was fascinating. In fact, the world itself was fascinating. The only part of the world that felt totally hacked together and bullshit was the Tonic/plasmid things. They were very clearly only there because plasmids were a thing in Bioshock.

But the story itself? Showed that it was heavily edited at the last minute. The ending was a 'twist' that was rather predictable. (which is fine, really. Endings that 'change everything' and are out of nowhere are kind of not good writing if you can't see the signs beforehand) major plotpoints are abandoned the moment they're not needed as background dressing. (I.E. Revolutionaries go from sympathetic to unsympathetic villains in the span of 5 minutes. Nothing portraying them as a positive thing occurs again because they're now enemies to get mowed down)

It also goes to great lengths to just be uh. I know this sounds odd, but horribly violent? There's times when the game feels more pointlessly violent than Postal 2. Don't get me wrong I love some random violent murder sprees. But it felt like it was out of character for the rest of what was going on. It felt very clearly like the story was at odds with the gameplay. And when your story is at odds with the gameplay, the gameplay suffers. Especially when its a game with as much story as Infinite.

Additionally, Emily is frickin annoying, very early on. Mostly due to her becoming nothing more than a thing that will give you ammo. Why explore, seek new things, when Emily will just give you it anyway? Nothing actually feels like it matters. Breaking into a secret area doesn't feel rewarding. Its just more junk you won't use because you don't need any of it.


Additionally, the handrail things that were so lauded, are mostly used to just jump onto and dodge bullets with while mowing down enemies that can't possibly aim at you. Its...sort of tedious. I think I started getting bored with the game about at the museum. And by the time it was nearing its last stretch and there was ghosts and mysteries being waved in my face that were obvious an hour before, I was done.

今天全剧情加DLC通关，
超级棒的游戏，就是海葬玩得有点不明觉厉，
强力推荐
没有伊丽莎白我要死了。

Damn... 
You know.. one of those games? Where you can't sleep without thinking about it all over again? The thought where you want to keep cycling over and over the game, just to relive the character once more? 

Well, all I can say is that the game is worth playing, thinking and to die for.

This game is wierd... IN A GOOD WAY!!
The quantum stuff makes for som interesting use of tactics and is well done.
The absolute best thing in the game is Elisabeth. She is the one NPC helper that is actually helpfull, soo good job Bioshock, you made a companion caracter I actually was interested in saving.

说起无限的主角，我觉得可能已经不是我们所操纵的那个布克了，伊丽莎白或许才是这个游戏的灵魂，如果撇开伊丽莎白，那么无限跟其他的fps游戏可能并没有多少区别。打个比方，我平时看网络小说，看只是为了纯粹的愉悦，而在不久前的某节课上，我读完挪威的森林，那个时候的我，内心没有丝毫的愉悦，有的只是满满的压抑与感慨，而伊丽莎白和直子在我的脑海里不禁有了几分重叠的味道。
刚刚通关，很多细节留待之后再补充吧~

TO the end 怅然若失的感觉。。。。。
 少有的几款给我极大震撼的游戏 ，音乐 画面  剧情都是一流，欠它一篇长评，有空再写吧。

Bioshock was an interesting world that departed from rapture in a big way. The graphics were nice, and your characters relationship with Elizabeth feels natural. 

I thought the game was let down by its ending however. 

6/10

Story, combat, feels, this game has it all.  Might have to buy the DLC

9/10

当初生化奇兵系列打折问同学值不值得入，同学说这部游戏阐释了为什么游戏是第九艺术，通关后真是感慨万千，毫无疑问的佳作，难能可贵，唯一觉得可惜的是伊丽莎白的建模再漂亮一些就好了hh，场景变化对比转换，bgm，操作手感，整体基调风格我都十分喜欢，剧情也十分紧凑，有深度，又是一部关于时间线的作品，我认为比《奇异人生》好，《奇异人生》实在是可惜了，额扯得貌似有点远，战斗方面比同时2k《无主之地》流畅舒服，个人认为比《古墓丽影9》略差一点，但是其他方面我更喜欢《无限》多一点，瞎鸡儿乱扯了这么多，总之就是好评，好评hh
10/10 would play again

The bulk of the game is fine. No major problems, even if I have a bunch of nitpicks about things that annoyed me. I would have been happy with the experience, but the final battle was unnecessary and annoying. Then it's followed by an ending that was so horrible that it marred whatever enjoyment I had playing the game in the first place. If I could go back and decide not to play this game, I would.

Infinite è l'apoteosi della trilogia di Levine, il miglior capitolo, la chiusura di un cerchio che rende tutto Bioshock molto più quadrato da comprendere.
Nonostante uno shooting non sempre al top, BI si contraddistingue per tutto il resto: storia, personaggi ed ambientazioni sono i pilastri di questa esperienza; solidi, ma soprattutto unici in tutto il panorama ludico contemporaneo. La bellezza di Bioshock, ed in particolare di questo Infinite, risiede proprio nell'essere libero dai vincoli del paragone, poiché raro esponente di un genere che solo raramente ha posto gli accenti sul "narrare una storia", piuttosto che "devastare orde di nemici".
Lo consiglio? Si, ma soltanto a chi ha già avuto la possibilità di finire il primo Bioshock, altrimenti vi perdereste davvero troppo, specialmente se giocherete anche i due DLC, purtroppo quasi indispensabili.

Cheers...a Booker!

ゲーム的にはBIOSHOCKと変わらずにいまいちなんだけど、ストーリーは映画っぽくて面白い。2周すると伏線が色々あることに気づいたりして、よりストーリーが楽しめる。
ただ、1,2とやってきたけど、これに関してはストーリー的にBIOSHOCKのタイトルをつける意味があるのかどうかは多少疑問がある。
今回は、弾とかがなくなると、一緒に連れて歩いてる女性が投げてくれるので弾丸やらの心配が1,2よりも少なくてストレスは少ない。﻿
O této hře už bylo napsáno hodně a vězte že všechna ta chvála je zasloužená. Takže si ji koukejte zahrát!
买了好段时间了，昨天才有空静静的把主线通了，其中伊丽莎白给我造成了深刻的印象，仿佛是一个鲜活的人一般，而非一个关闭游戏后就抛诸脑后的NPC，今早把DLC也通了，看着伊丽莎白香消玉殒，居然有种怅然若失的感觉，要是剧情再长点儿，那就更好了。
Elizabeth <3

This is a very subjective review; Bioshock Infinite isn't a necessarily a bad game, it just didn't live up to my expectations.

Honestly it's got some neat ideas, great visuals and whatnot. However it's not the game I thought it was going to be. Crowbcat did an excellent video on youtube about the Bioshock Infinite that never was. It's tough to compare this game to the hypothetical version in my imagination, but the original concept seemed much more interesting than what we ended up getting.

While there's still fun to be had, it's much different from the pitch I based my anticipations on long ago.

Bioshock Infinite is the most perfect video game ever made. Sure, I have spent more time in other games, and in many ways gotten more enjoyment out of other games. But Bioshock Infinite is the single most perfect gem for the time spent in its world, even if the replay value is not necessarily as potent as that of other similar story-driven games. The story in this game is one of the greatest works of fiction that I have ever come across in my life, if not the best. I do not dare spoil the plot. Any of it. Discover and explore the wonderful world of Columbia for yourself. Find its secrets and follow your own path. The story and game in general hit me so hard that I have a serious problem believing I will ever experience something this masterfully crafted as long as I live. The combat? Wonderful fun. So many different options and your companion/deuteragonist complements the combat exceptionally well; the best video game companion mechanic and story-wise you'll ever see. The soundtrack? Splendidly emotional (I had a hard time believing some of the songs I love from this game are from the 1860s and 70s! Incredible). This is what I think of when I think of the perfect game. I believe anybody with a remote interest in shooters or video games in general should play this game. But seriously, play it on a computer that will allow you to enjoy it. Take the specs seriously; I can't imagine playing this game on a bad computer.

神作！！确实对得起“第九艺术”这种称号！
画面清晰明亮，让我这种一二代连续玩下来的人十分感动，又见到明亮的场景了555555
情节设置上对于和一代情节的呼应，多个时空的把控，以及对回忆杀,文字音频，幻想等等叙述手法的合理运用使得情节的高大上得到进一步强化，而lutesi姐弟的设计既是推动剧情的关键钥匙，也是放松玩家心情的要素。
至于伊丽莎白。。。想说的实在太多，干脆什么也不想说了，伊丽莎白俺の嫁，不服憋着。
话说海葬DLC的销魂城才是正确的重置姿势啊！

bioshock infinite bites off more than it can chew and, as a result, gives you a mess of a game. a lot of thought went into setting up the conflict between the people of columbia & the vox populi, only for the plot itself to discard it for space-time shenanigans; in the end, it only serves as environmental texture & none of it is confronted or explored in a meaningful way. the game doesn't give it too much thought & goes from actively painting the vox populi as sympathetic oppressed peoples to demonizing them as no better than the ruling white supremacist government in the course of five minutes. suddenly, the vox populi is indistinguishable from the fascist government of columbia & the game gives them the "these are the baddies now, shoot them" treatment by making them almost indistinguishable from their columbia counterparts.

outside of the plot, the level design was clumsy. like the plot, it was fairly ambitious by presenting you with an array of options for explorations, like the skyline (which usually just takes you around a loop). in some parts, you have closed areas but there are some arcs of the game that are set in an "open world" sort of level. in some of the quests, this becomes confusing, because, more often than not, you will have to go back and forth to find things you've missed in order to trigger storyline events. not to mention that exploration was usually interrupted by random battles that ended being drawn-out because the enemy spawns wouldn't stop. it's one thing to have a set of enemies in an area, another is to have more than you actually counted because you keep spawning them. 

all in all, pretty mediocre & disappointing. but at the very least, the combat system & vigors was excellent.
Una maravilla, obra de arte como bien dicen algunos !
Super gra w świetnym steampunkowym klimacie. Jeśli szukacie FPS osadzonego w przestworzach z intrygującą fabuła to jedyny słuszny wybór.

Am I the only one who keeps playing the game, although I know how the ending like. Never feel bored with this game.

Vibbyish

Joo'o.. peli kun käyntiin pärähtää niin kyllähän siitä erityisesti ne alkuperäiset Bioshock fiilikset vasten kasvoja iskee erittäin vahvasti..

..jos pidit Bioshockeistä ja erityisesti ensimmäisestä tulee taatusti rakastamaan tätä, mut jos se ei napannut tuskin tämäkään nappasee yhtään sen enempää.. sen verran samasta puusta veistettyjä tuotoksia edelleen ovat, vain maailma on tällä kertaa eri ja tietysti tarina mutta sitäkin edistetään hyvin tutun keinoin..

..tunnelmapuoli joka ensimmäisten Bioshockeissa oli se kaikki kaikessa. Pelin iskevyys on todella paljon siitä kiinni kuinka syvälle pelaaja itse pystyy eläytymään vähän tuollaiseen vinksahtaneeseen maailmaan, vai jääkö se etäiseksi kokemukseksi.. Se on sitä tässäkin mutta tällä kertaa erittäin suuri muutos on se että nyt ei mennä aivan niin autioituneessa paikassa vaan huomattavasti elävämmäsä kuin mitä aiemmin mentiin. Tuo todella kaivattua vaihtelua.. vielä kun kyseinen "pilvimaailma" on todella valoisa ja värikäs niin luo upean kontrastin niille aiemmille tuotoksille.

Jos tykkää virtuaaliseikkailla todella idyllisissä maisemissa, joidenka luomiseen on käytetty aikaa kaikin puolin, niin kannattaa tälle mahdollisuus suoda ! Tarinallisesti otetaan vielä entistä rivakkaampi ote "uskonnollisuuteen" heti kättelystä lähtien.. saas nähdä mitä tuleman pitää.. itse ainakin kerinnyt jo hitusen tympimtymään tuohon ammuskeluun jota tuntuu todellakin piisaavan heti alun jälkeen kerta kiellon päälle.. harmi jos tämäkin peli vesitetään sillä että pitää taas miljoonas vihulaislauma peräjälkeen vaan tappaa ajankuluksi, hoh hoijaaa  ..

Itselläni oli kans Bioshockissa jokin joka ei vaan napannut aivan sillä tasolla kuin ois toivonut. Mut ihan jees tämä alku tässä ollut ja alun perusteella nättiä maailmaa on ollut mut saas nähdä.. ei tämä kyllä meikän listoilla mihinkään unohtumattomimpien ja upeinpien joukkoon todennäköisesti mene mutta laadukasta ainakin maailman osalta ja ainakin jollain tapaa tuollainen aina kiehtoo väkisinkin, jos pelistä huokuu se että tekijät ovat siihen omaa kiintymystään niin tolkuttomasti uhranneet..

..kovasti tuntuvat erityisesti loppua kehuvan monet että se on jotain jollaista harvemmin videopeleissä koetaan. hehkutuksiin on myös yhtynyt itse pelin iskä elikkäs Ken Levine joka kertoo sen olevan jotain poikkeuksellista vidfeopelimaailmassa, saas nähdä pitääkö paikkaansa. Saisiko se pelin nousemaan unohtumattomien listalle ?

Teknisesti vaikutti ihan pätevältä tämä, varsinkin ensimmäinen aikoinaan kompuroi PS3 versiona aika pahastikin jo köhi oikein kunnolla jos toimintaa oli vähänkään ruudulla ja ajoittain meinas rauhallistakin ois ollut.

Kaupan hyllyssä sattui olemaan normi versio ja tuollainen Premium Ediiton samaan hintaan niin jälkimmäienen tuli napsastua mukaan.. Löytyy extroina itse "lootan" lisäksi Limited Edition Artbook, Handyman Miniature, Devil's Kiss Lithograph, Murder of Crows Keychain, Digital Soundtrack, PSN Themes.

Ai niin.. kylllä vaan, aikoinaanhan herätti kovasti ärtyneisyyttä kun pelin kansitaiteeksi paljastui yllättäen niikin omaperäinen idea kuin mies ja ase.. siitä sitten tehtiin netissä äänestys jossa oli vähän taiteellisempiakin näkemyksiä vaihtoehtoina joista kansa sai äänestä ja kyllä vaan.. äänestyksen voittaja on siellä vaihtoehtokontena jos kansilehtisen kääntään.. aivan kuten Mass Effect 3:ssa oli joko nais tai mies Shepard tai Cathrinessa joko vaalea vamppi tai tumma viehätys a'la Cathrine tai Katherine.. tässä ei tosin ole mitään henkilötaidetta tosiaankaan tuo vaihtoehto vaan jotain aivan muuta sit !
非常棒，刚开始以为是小游戏结果没想到这么大。游戏画面 背景 基本都可以作为壁纸 ，超级美。
Одна из лучших игр десятилетия. Сюжет сложен и красив. Спасибо геймдизайнеру и сценаристу)

Красивая, красочная интересная игрушка с хорошим сюжетом. Игра шутер с элементами рпг и научной фантастики. Игрок собирает оружие, аптечки и плазмиды, дающие ему сверхспособности, такие как телекинез или электрошок, всё время отбиваясь от сумасшедшего населения города. Играя в биошок ты погружаешся в мир созданный автором, и понимаешь насколько же качественно сделана каждая деталь в этой игре - от музыки, картинки, панорамных видов городов до диалогов персонажей. Запутанная и мистическая история главного героя заставит вас неотрываясь от экрана пройти ее до конца. Постоянный экшен и хорор будет преследовать вас на протяжении всего сюжета.

Be unbroken...

Ну что могу сказать - игра весьма впечатлила, графика ошеломляющая красотой, сюжет накрученный, интересный, но концовка конечно выносит мозг конкретно) Поэтому после того как пройдёте игру - идите в интернет и поищите объяснения, ибо там реально закрутили - фиг поймёшь, но понять нужно, и когда вам подскажут и вы найдёте ответ - то все ваши "паззлики" в голове сразу сложатся и вы поймёте на сколько гениальна вся история в целом. А так вообще лично я не любитель паропанка, игр о старых временах и т.п., а вот "энергетики"-спец.способности - тут радуют. Печально, что пушки можно носить только 2. И очень рекомендую поставить русификацию текстур - ибо всяких плакатов, надписей и прочего в игре просто тьма. 
Так что в целом 8/10. 
ЗЫ. И всё таки круче Half-Life я пока ничего не встречал)...

如果你决定玩这个游戏，请不要看攻略，自觉避免任何形式的可能的剧透。

这游戏的优点是剧情的设计与挖掘，所以玩fps游戏只喜欢射射射的快感的同学请不要入它（雾）
这真的不是你的菜，你们应该入的是doom4.

Mindblown.

Es lo único que puedo decir luego de terminar esta obra maestra.
Definitivamente el juego es arte en estado puro; los diseños, la música, los personajes, la historia, la ambientación, el lore, la crítica social, la narrativa, Elizabeth. Todo esta hilado de forma brillante.
Columbia es una ciudad hermosa, a veces simplemente me detenía a contemplar, maravillado, de lo bien que estaba plasmado cada lugar dentro de esta ciudad aérea, sin duda algo de ensueño. 

Jugablemente, Bioshock Infinite es impecable, hay muchas habilidades y mejoras para el personaje, el combate es ágil, con diversas posibilidades a la hora de afrontarlos, dependiendo de tu estilo de juego. En el apartado de armas cuenta con bastante variedad, que también al igual que las habilidades pueden mejorarse, dando un toque RPG al juego.

Si bien es cierto que el juego es muy lineal, definitivamente es  algo que ni siquiera puedo poner como negativo, y es que entre más avanzas, más quieres saber que está sucediendo y que sucederá, ya que el hilo principal de este título es contarnos la odisea que enfrentarán Booker DeWitt y Elizabeth Comstock, para poder escapar de esta aparentemente utópica ciudad, aunque eso es solo la cereza del pastel, lo que te espera en Infinite es algo que debes vivirlo; una vez terminada esta aventura, ya tendrá sentido la palabra que puse al inicio del análisis.

En mi opinión, totalmente recomendado, es un imperdible para todo aquel que sepa apreciar un buen videojuego, hecho con dedicación.

9/10

                                                                       gameplay good

Si aun queda alguien que no sepa nada de la trama, es un gran shooter con un sistema de combate bastante entretenido al contar con poderes que se pueden enlazar entre si y railes por donde puedes deslizarte, la trama es bastante interesante, pese a tener un par de cosas que se sacan de la nada.
En cuanto a tu acompañante, si bien todo el mundo la adora, bueno, esta bien, es util porque te da recursos en combate y porque es la waifu del juego, al final se le coje cariño, pero tampoco se llega a empatizar con ella como "personalidad" antes de objeto de sanacion, aun asi, tiene un gran cambio que me gusta mucho y es muy radical a lo largo de la trama.

Muy recomendable

This is one of my favorite games of all time. Game with one of the best stories of all time with good combat and cool beautiful scenery. Definently worth buying, 9.5/10

In depth

The game does not have anything in common with the previous games, and it is located in a completely new area. Columbia, a floating city in the sky is gorgeous and the scenery is very light and pleasing, although the residents of columbia look very wierd from time to time, but that is a very minor detail to me. You play the game as Booker, a private investigator who is trying to fill a deal by retrieving  "the girl." The main charachters are good, there is depth and you actually care for all of them. The storyline is absolutely great and it makes your head go around. It is a perfect combination of emotions and head-spinning details. The story gets a full 10/10 and that is what is so great about this game. 

The combat system is fun, not too fast-paced action with many guns and vigors, similar to previous games, but the guns are better in this one. There are many upgrades, not much changed since the previous games. The combat does get a little repeditive, even though they tried adding more guns and upgrades. This is pretty much the only thing that drops the final score. Fun bosses, and the combat was not boring at any times, even if it was slightly repeditive. 

The game has everything a good game needs. Wonderful story, good action, beautiful scenery and charachters. 
Also the DLC is a completely new game, and definently worth buying. It is a bit darker spin of the original game with scenery from bioshock 1 and 2, also definently worth buying.

Contra más lo juegas, más te engancha. Para los que busquen un Bioshock 3 no lo disfrutaréis. Os recomiendo que lo tratéis como un juego a parte, ya que lo único que tiene en común con las anteriores entregas es la manera de jugar (poderes, armas, máquinas expendedoras...). 

Lo mejor de todo es su historia, y ese final... ten unas cuantas neuronas de reserva por que te va a petar varias.

Bioshock Infinite is a solid shooter, but not without flaws. You play as Booker Dewit, a private eye sent to the flying city of Columbia to find a woman named Elizabeth. In most games, this would result in at least one pain-in-the-a** escort mission, but this is not a normal game. Elizabeth instead acts like a guardian angel, tossing you health and ammo when you need them most and bringing in stuff (e.g. turrets, health, weapons) from other dimensions. This, combined with riding around on skylines, makes the combat flow nicely (for the most part). The story is pretty decent, with at least 1 mind-f*ck ending I'm not going to spoil. 
Now we get to the bad parts. Towards the end, enemies (especially ones with RPGs), seem unfeasably tankish: they can survive multiple shotgun blasts to the face, and are almost immune to melee. Booker himself seems a bit generic, but thats just my personal taste.

Overall: 8.5/10, would play again

I played it with both Burial at Sea episodes.
Finished it in some 15-16 hours of gameplay.

There are so many mindfucks through the storyline, SO MANY.

But everything comes to a complete circle at the end of Burial At Sea ep. 2. It basically completes the entire Bioshock Saga. It has been absolutely amazing.

I've heard so much about it before, and everything I heard about it was true. All of it.



Now, about gameplay.
Great gameplay! Great combat! You can literally move around quickly using skylines in most of the areas and switch positions to attack from a sniping position or bombard them, or use one of Elizabeth's "tear-ed" in items, it provides you with a LOT of items to use in battle.

Plus, the Clash in the Clouds DLC provides dedicated arenas for such badass battles.

Loved all of it.


Tip for first time players:
Use infusions to max up the shield first. That regenerates like the armor energy shield in Halo. Exactly like that.

唯美的画风，萌萌的AI，不买是人吗！
剧情满分，伊丽莎白满分！！

Yes, the presentation is excellent, the graphics and sound are awesome, performance is good with all the DX11 effects enabled and yes the "old-timey" cover version of Tears for Fears "Everybody wants to rule the world" is a nice easter-egg.
BUT - the gameplay is extremely tedious. I've tried different difficulty settings and the 1999 hardcore mode. But still, no fun at all.
The fact that the ammo is scarce, but not Elizabeth's is baffling. Where does she find the ammo?! And why isn't there a cool-down on her abilities? How does she dodge bullets? Is it because of her quantum-"kajigger"? The plot-hole-McGuffin? It would make much more sense to play as Elizabeth, but then we couldn't stare at her boobs, of course. Pity.

-Presentation is outstanding, but the non-sense "story" and the boring, boring arena-style death-matches ruin the experience.

Elizabeth wears a choker 

is a thot

10/10

Amazing game! Great story and the gameplay is really cool as well.

Gonna make this quick .  Dont play this game on lower difficulty!! Just go for the highest one and you will change as a person. You will start hating yourself for torturing your self. But at the end of the day you will love the guilty pleasure. This game litterally becomes darksouls at the highest difficulty. So stop being a casual, its your time to prove your gaming skills.

Comparto tecnico molto buono, ambientazioni mozzafiato (giusta la scelta secondo me di ambientare questo capitolo in cielo anzichè nelle profondità marine), ma continuo a preferire il primo Bioshock per quel che concerne la storia.
完美的剧情，精美的枪支模型，丰富的技能，足够的游戏性

游戏时间 10小时一周目中等难度通关，前来写评测
+++丰富的游戏细节——世界观、乌托邦式的上流社会、激烈的社会矛盾、个人崇拜主义的宗教、蒸汽朋克科技、一战时代大背景等方面的设定，在此不一一赘述
+++曲折烧脑的故事剧情
++小姐姐伊丽莎白人设满分（外貌、性格、特别是AI）
+画面优秀，描绘了一个无与伦比的哥伦比亚天空城
+有一定挑战的FPS


-战斗方面欠佳，定位尴尬的异能系统
-剧情虽好，但稍显牵强
-整体流程稍短

总体 9.8 / 10 强烈推荐
绝对的神作，不玩后悔终生

Its hard the say how crazy and fun this series is with mere words. Infinite stands on a tower that is very difficult to topple. 

To keep this short, I'll end it with a simple warning:

If you don't meet the minimum system requirements, you're going to get a LOT of frame drops due to how much shit is going down all in one battle.

One of those games that gives you that warm fuzzy feeling playing it. Good writing can go a long way even if the gun play isn't exactly that great. I only wish we had more time to explore happy fun Columbia befor the grim dark happens.

Wow. Fantastic game. I REALLY enjoyed the story and the gameplay. Having played the first two Bioshocks is not required, but it will definitely add value to the story if you have.

Others have gone into much more detail than I have and I don't see the point in mirroring what others have said. What I will say, is that I recommend this game to everyone.
Decent.

One of the best stories in games. The ending will leave you confused but at the same time it will stick with you. I'd reccomend also playing the Buried at Sea DLC if you've played the other Bioshock games. Go into this game knowing as little about it as possible.
神作
